member.name: M:Resco.UIElements.Controls.UIBaseComboBoxControl.OnDropDown(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: An that contains the event data.

remarks.p: The event occurs when the drop-down calendar is shown.
The OnDropDown method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
Notes to Inheritors: When overriding OnDropDown in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's OnDropDown method so that registered delegates receive the event.

member.name: M:Resco.UIElements.Controls.UIBaseComboBoxControl.OnDropDownClosed(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: An that contains the event data.

remarks.p: The event occurs when the drop-down is dismissed and disappears.
The OnDropDownClosed method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
Notes to Inheritors: When overriding OnCloseUp in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's OnCloseUp method so that registered delegates receive the event.

member.name: P:Resco.UIElements.Controls.UIDateTimePickerControl.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text associated with this control. Throws a FormatException if the specified text is not a valid date.
member.value: A string that represents the text associated with this control.
member.remarks:
The string returned by this property is equivalent to the property with the appropriate formatting or custom formatting applied.
When setting this property, the string must be convertible to an instance of the class. It is possible to define a custom format that results in a string that cannot be converted to a valid DateTime value. Because of this, the string returned from the Text property might cause an error if it is passed back to the Text property. If the string cannot be converted to a date/time value, the class throws a .

member.remarks: You can change Today text when you are doing localization.

member.name: P:Resco.UIElements.Controls.UIListViewControl.TouchScrollFriction
member.summary: Specifies the physical friction that influences the speed of scrolling.

remarks.para: The value must be positive. It specifies the frame rate for scrolling animation. The default value is 10. This value simulates the smooth surface and it is optimal for a list-view with a longer document.
If the slower scrolling is desired (let's say for smaller documents), set the higher friction that will simulate the rough surface and scrolling the scrolling will stop in shorter time.

member.name: P:Resco.UIElements.Controls.UIListViewControl.TouchScrollSensitivity
member.summary: Parametric value for touch scroll.

member.name: P:Resco.UIElements.Controls.UIListViewControl.BounceMode
member.summary: Enable touch to outside of document size. Control automatically scroll to nearest valid position after mouse up event.
